title: About Me
text:
Full Story

About Me
I hold a Masterâ€™s in Applied Economics and Statistics from the University of Lorraine. Most recently, I worked with financial data at CACEIS and SociÃ©tÃ© GÃ©nÃ©rale, focusing on transaction analysis, data cleaning, and dashboard reporting. These roles strengthened my skills in SQL, Access, and statistical tools, while deepening my passion for making data accessible and actionable.


Skills & Tools

Programming & Data: R, SQL, Excel, Access, VBA

Analysis: Descriptive & inferential statistics, data cleaning

Visualization & Reporting: Power BI, R Shiny, dashboards, presentations



Projects & Highlights

Sales Performance Analysis

Challenge: A company needed actionable insights into sales performance, broken down by product line and warehouse.

What I Did: Used SQL to clean and transform messy datasets, then applied R and ggplot2 to visualize sales trends.

Impact: Discovered a revenue decline in a specific warehouse and delivered recommendations that helped the team take corrective action.



Process Optimization & Collaboration

Automated Excel and Access macros, improving data quality and efficiency.

Enhanced SQL queries to include new fields, expanding reporting capabilities.

Collaborated with colleagues on form design and procedure documentation, making workflows more accessible and consistent.




What Iâ€™m Looking For
Iâ€™m seeking a data analyst role where I can apply statistics and programming (R or Python) to solve real-world problems. Iâ€™m especially interested in marketing, sales, or user behavior data.
I thrive at the intersection of technical analysis and communication, helping teams turn data into actionable strategies. While I enjoy being on-site, Iâ€™m also open to remote opportunities.


Beyond Data
Outside of work, I enjoy playing video games (Persona 5 Royal, God of War) and taking walks in the park â€” especially in winter, my favorite season. Iâ€™m also a big fan of movies like Inception and Jackie Brown, which inspire me with their immersive worlds and memorable characters.
Iâ€™m naturally curious, and that curiosity drives my growth. Right now, Iâ€™m sharpening my Power BI skills to keep building more effective and impactful dashboards.


Letâ€™s Connect
Take a look at my portfolio to see projects that highlight both my technical expertise and communication skills.
If youâ€™d like to get in touch, connect with me on LinkedIn or send me a message via the contact form. Iâ€™m open to new opportunities and short-term projects â€” and always happy to discuss how I can help your team make better data-driven decisions.
